overview: Gloria and Catherine spend an exciting night recalling a wild experience with a lesbian out-call service. One girl wasn't enough to take care of the two beauties, so they called for more help. The more the merrier in these gals' books! Watch them caress, lick, and fondle until they squirm and wriggle with their orgasmic delight! The group of lovelies perform some of the wildest acts ever filmed on video.
title: Women's Secret Desires
